verses.text_plain: I will sing of mercy and judgment: unto thee, O Lord, will I sing.
verses.verse_html: 1I will sing of mercy and judgment: unto thee, O Lord, will I sing.

verses.text_plain: I will behave myself wisely in a perfect way. O when wilt thou come unto me? I will walk within my house with a perfect heart.
verses.verse_html: 2I will behave myself wisely in a perfect way. O when wilt thou come unto me? I will walk within my house with a perfect heart.

verses.text_plain: I will set no wicked thing before mine eyes: I hate the work of them that turn aside; it shall not cleave to me.
verses.verse_html:
3I will set no wicked thing before mine eyes: I hate the work of them that turn aside; it shall not cleave to me. ▼
▼ wicked…: Heb. thing of Belial

footnotes.body_html: ▼ wicked…: Heb. thing of Belial

verses.text_plain: A froward heart shall depart from me: I will not know a wicked person.
verses.verse_html: 4A froward heart shall depart from me: I will not know a wicked person.

tokens.text: from me: I will not know

verses.text_plain: Whoso privily slandereth his neighbour, him will I cut off: him that hath an high look and a proud heart will not I suffer.
verses.verse_html: 5Whoso privily slandereth his neighbour, him will I cut off: him that hath an high look and a proud heart will not I suffer.

verses.text_plain: Mine eyes shall be upon the faithful of the land, that they may dwell with me: he that walketh in a perfect way, he shall serve me.
verses.verse_html:
6Mine eyes shall be upon the faithful of the land, that they may dwell with me: he that walketh in a perfect way, he shall serve me. ▼
▼ in a…: or, perfect in the way

footnotes.body_text: ▼ in a…: or, perfect in the way
footnotes.body_html: ▼ in a…: or, perfect in the way

verses.text_plain: He that worketh deceit shall not dwell within my house: he that telleth lies shall not tarry in my sight.
verses.verse_html:
7He that worketh deceit shall not dwell within my house: he that telleth lies shall not tarry in my sight. ▼
▼ shall not tarry: Heb. shall not be established

footnotes.body_text: ▼ shall not tarry: Heb. shall not be established
footnotes.body_html: ▼ shall not tarry: Heb. shall not be established

verses.text_plain: I will early destroy all the wicked of the land; that I may cut off all wicked doers from the city of the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 8I will early destroy all the wicked of the land; that I may cut off all wicked doers from the city of the Lord.
